document.full_text: pentagon officials remained quiet on questions about the accuracy of greg mortenson's book "three cups of tea" and the management of his charity set up to build schools in afghanistan and pakistan.
document.title: at war: pentagon is quiet on 'three cups of tea'
lines_and_colors: pentagon officials remained quiet on questions about the accuracy of greg mortenson's book "three cups of tea" and the management of his charity set up to build schools in afghanistan and pakistan.
